description:
UMD 3.13.4 is a security update of the third Major release of UMD 
(Unified Middleware Distribution) made available for the EGI production 
infrastructure. This release contains a security fix for dCache server.
releaseNotes: The release contains the following package:<br><br>dCache 2.10.41<br><br>for Sl5 and SL6.<div style="left: 70px; top: -33px;" id="wrtranslator-translate"><a target="_blank" href="http://www.wordreference.com/enit/39#articleHead">Translate</a></div>
installationNotes: All products in the UMD 3.13.4 release were verified against EGI's current Quality Criteria (for further information, please see the documentation links) to support Scientific Linux 5 and Scientific Linux 6. Installation and configuration notes are available in the <a href="http://repository.egi.eu/category/umd_releases/distribution/umd-3/">EGI repository</a>.
contact:
For further information about the UMD, its goals and surrounding 
processes, and more information about how to engage as a Technology 
Provider with EGI, please send an Email to: cto (at) egi.eu.
technicalContact: For any bugs and issues you encounter that are not described in the release notes of this UMD release, or the related documentation provided by the Technology Providers, please visit the <a href="https://ggus.eu/">EGI Helpdesk</a> to make a report.
changeLog: This releases includes updates for the following products: dCache server.

products.name: dcache.dcache
products.description: dCache provides system for storing and retrieving huge amounts of data, distributed among a large number of heterogenous server nodes, under a single virtual filesystem tree with a variety of standard access methods.
